2.4. Variables¶

settings.var.badges¶

PLACEHOLDER. Array of all badge names.

Type

Object

Value
['trophy', 'medal', 'console', 'loyal', 'grad', 'love', 'review', 'tour', 'verified']
settings.var.cache¶

Local copy of user data saved in the database.

Type

Object

Value
{}
